translations: v．数量上超过，比……多：在数量上超过另一个群体或事物。

sentences.sentence: Up to 90,000 tourists crowd its streets and canals every day—far outnumbering the 55,000 permanent residents.
sentences.translation: 每天有多达9万名游客挤在这里的街道和运河上，远远超过5.5万名永久居民的数量。

sentences.sentence: Up to 90,000 tourists crowd its streets and canals every day — far outnumbering the 55,000 permanent residents.
sentences.translation: 每天有多达9万名游客聚集在这里的街道和运河上，数量远远超过了5.5万名常住居民。

sentences.sentence: The global ant population is estimated at 10, 000 trillion, greatly outnumbering any other sort of animal.
sentences.translation: 据估计，全球蚂蚁总量有1亿亿，远远超过其它任何物种。
